  • RISTORANTE

  • ROOFTOP
    at Royalton Park Avenue

  • SUNDECK
Sundeck

sundeck

The Sundeck is located at the top of Royalton Park Avenue's tri-level rooftop and can hold up to 180 people with flexible seating. Great for soaking up some Vitamin D during the day and sipping a cool cocktail during the evening hours. The Sundeck serves up traditional and frozen drinks, like our classic Frosé cocktail, an extended beer menu, as well as delicious café bites. Our High C menu is available on the weekends and offers a Savory or Sweet medley with Champagne.

SUNDECK HOURS:
Monday - Friday 4:00pm - Close

Saturday & Sunday 12:00pm - Close 

*Join us for High C on the weekends*
